text: Stop what you're doing. Stop it right now. I have to show you something. Quick!! It is these photos of a movie starring Liam Hemsworth, Priyanka Chopra, and Rebel Wilson. But these are not just any photos. They are bonkers photos. They come from the New York City set of Isn't It Romantic, a romantic comedy coming out on Valentine's Day 2019.
